subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Tom Coughlin’s last act as Giants coach, like his first 12 years ago, was an emotional, high-energy oration, leaving many in his audience, including Eli Manning, fighting back tears.
snippet: Tom Coughlin’s last act as Giants coach, like his first 12 years ago, was an emotional, high-energy oration, leaving many in his audience, including Eli Manning, fighting back tears.
